itemDescription: Director, MRC Laboratory of Molecular Biology, University of Cambridge

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Hugh Reginald Brentnall Pelham,  (born 26 August 1954) is a cell biologist who has contributed to our understanding of the body's response to rises in temperature through the synthesis of heat shock proteins. He served as director of the Medical Research Council (MRC) Laboratory of Molecular Biology (LMB) between 2006 and 2018.

*Dr Hugh Reginald Brentnall Pelham, director, Laboratory of Molecular Biology, Medical Research Council. For services to Science.
